column4: メリッサ＿しょうがないな

あんたたちだけだと
危なっかしいから、
私が立会い人をやるからね。
column5: Since things might turn ugly, I'm going to be spectating.
column11: Because things might turn ugly, I'm going to be spectating.

column5: Go ahead and get set up.
column11: So, go and get set up.

column4:
今日は本気出すから。
そっちも全力で！
column5:
Today, I'm going to take this seriously.
You'd better give it your all too!
column11:
Today, I'm going to take it seriously.
You'd better give it your all too!

column4: アンマリー＿操縦葛藤する
（由緒正しい人形使いの家系）
column5: (I come from an old and honorable lineage of Puppeteers.)
column11: (I come from an old and honourable lineage of puppeteers.)

column5: (I won't lose. I'll make sure of it.)
column11: (I won't lose. I'll make sure of it.)

column4: アンマリー＿操縦ニヤリ
